name: MangoREST
description: Serve a RESTful API from any MongoDB database.

FLASK_ENV.description: Sets the context to where Flask is running in.

FLASK_APP.description: For specifying how to load the application.

DATABASE.description: Name of the database to be exposed to REST clients. Only one (1) allowed.

COLLECTIONS.description: Sequence of `resource_name:collection_name` pairs separated by commas. (Example) rockets:rocket_engines,vehicles:launch_vehicles
